title: Nordic Pension Funds Can Promote Sustainable Development
content:
The capital managed by Nordic pension funds can play a significant role in driving a sustainable transition ‚Äì both through the concrete effects of their investments and by sending signals to other investors. Yet, even as efforts are made to move in a more sustainable direction, pension capital continues to support unsustainable activities.

How are environmental and climate impacts considered in pension fund investments? How do pension funds respond to external demands ‚Äì for example from environmental organisations or pension savers ‚Äì to divest from fossil fuels? And how do sustainability officers and fund managers work with sustainability issues, and with what consequences for the future that pension capital is meant to help build?
